text:
is there a way to get the `slug` from `{{ content.translated_content.values()|selectattr('published') }}` without having to pass it through a `for loop`? Something like `{{ content.translated_content.values()|selectattr('published').slug }}` (this doesn’t work)?

I’m looking to just obtain the slugs, for my custom language switcher
Does anyone know if plugins/js libraries like nice select will work properly with HubSpot forms?
